title: Module Pre-Planning Questions
description: Essential questions to answer before implementing a new module

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of this module?
questions.guidance: Be specific about what business problem this module solves
examples: Manage customer contact information and communication history

questions.question: What are the key functionalities this module will provide?
questions.guidance: List 3-7 core features. Be specific but not overly detailed

questions.question: Who are the primary users of this module?
questions.guidance: Identify user roles and their relationship to the module
examples: Sales team members, customer service representatives

questions.question: What are the main data entities this module will manage?
questions.guidance: List the key data objects with their primary attributes
examples: Contact: name, email, phone, company, tags

questions.question: What external systems or APIs will this module integrate with?
questions.guidance: Include both internal modules and external services. Note: Authentication, UI components, and deployment are covered in the development guide.

questions.question: What are the performance and scalability requirements?
questions.guidance: Consider data volume, concurrent users, response times

questions.question: What additional security and privacy considerations are important for this module?
questions.guidance: Focus on module-specific security needs. Basic authentication and security setup is covered in the development guide.
examples: PII data encryption for sensitive fields

questions.question: What are the key user interface requirements specific to this module?
questions.guidance: Focus on module-specific UI needs. Standard components and patterns are available in the development guide.
examples: Dashboard with contact overview, search bar, filterable list
Bulk action capabilities for mass updates

questions.question: How will you measure the success of this module?
examples: Reduce time to find contact information by 50%
Process imports 10x faster than current system

questions.question: What constraints or limitations should be considered beyond the standard tech stack?
questions.guidance: Focus on module-specific constraints. Standard tech stack and architecture patterns are defined in the development guide.
